weeklyBonusSubtitle:
At the start of the week, your coins will be filled to 100.
Enjoy your week and let's play!
tutorialHomeContent: Please press this menu to proceed.
tutorialPublicPouleContent: Compete with other members in the Better United community in an epic prediction battle! Create your own prediction of your favourite league matches.
tutorialFriendLeagueContent: Compete with your friends in the Better United community in a private prediction battle! Create your own poule and have a fun competition with people you invited.
tutorialActivePoulesContent: Stay engaged and keep an eye on your epic competitions. Monitor your ongoing poules by accessing the active poules section.
tutorialChosenMatchDescription: Here you can see your current chosen match and league.
tutorialPredictionIndicatorDescription: Make your prediction by choosing an indicator from this menu of options. Points shown may vary depending on the situation.
tutorialRankingDescription: Please press this menu to proceed.
tutorialRankingTwoDescription: This leaderboard displays the standings of Better United community members, determined by their points earned during the current week or season.
tutorialRankingTeamOfSeasonDescription: The points you earn from your activities will be collected to contribute to your Team of the Season ranking.
tutorialShopDescription: Please press this menu to proceed.
tutorialShopTwoDescription: You have the option to buy our official merchandise or coin bundles to enhance your poules experience and enjoy more games with your friends.
tutorialProfileDescription: Please press this menu to proceed.
tutorialProfileTwoDescription: Witness your journey unfold and revel in the thrill of your latest triumphs, ensuring you're always in the loop with your most recent achievements!
aboutText:
Better United is an app that allows users to view and place tips (initially only football) in a playful, easy and well-organized way and they are also rewarded for placing the right tips. As a result, their profile ranks on the platform and they go from grandstand customer to club legend.Better United is not only a platform to view and post tips, but also to play pools with friends and/or the entire community in an innovative way. A Friends League where you can determine the length yourself and you can make predictions not only on the result but also on all known betting markets.

Better United. Because United we are Better.
tellUsMore:
Thank you for your feedback!

choosePouleDescription: You can compete against every member in the Better United community and win great rewards in public poules!

friendPoulePrizeDisclaimer: The sum of coins decided must be paid by the other participants. The number of players who signed up for this poule will determine the overall prize pool.

rankingDescription: This leaderboard displays the standings of Better United community members, determined by their points earned during the current week or season, which are the cumulative points obtained from the completed poules.
teamOfTheWeekInfoDialogDescription: The Team of the Week showcases the previous week's top 11 players, and these exceptional individuals are duly rewarded for their performance in securing this elite status.
teamOfTheSeasonInfoDialogDescription: The Team of the Season showcases the previous season's top 11 players, and these exceptional individuals are duly rewarded for their performance in securing this elite status.
